sentences.cn: 然而合作的效率是有代价的.

sentences.en: Collaborative objectives aligning supply chain strategies such as sale and management goal.
sentences.cn: 以具体协同目标为导向的合作方式,具体协同目标必须与销售、营等供应链战略目标相一致.

sentences.en: Dynamic, young, collaborative team of professionals.
sentences.cn: 活力 、 年轻 、 协同集成的专业团队.

sentences.en: Finally, the P - HUSTCAID remote synchro collaborative prototype system is designed and realized.
sentences.cn: 最后, 参考HUSTCAID系统的功能,设计并实现了P-HUSTCAID远程同步系统原型.

sentences.en: However essential expertise is, the class stresses the artistic , conceptual, collaborative side of the craft.
sentences.cn: 无论专业技术是多么重要, 课程把重点放在了技术的艺术性 、 设计概念和协作性方面.

sentences.en: However essential technical expertise is, the class stresses the artistic , conceptual, collaborative side of the craft.
sentences.cn: 无论专业技术是多麽重要, 课程把重点放在技术的艺术性 、 设计概念和协作性方面.

sentences.en: Large scale studies should be collaborative.
sentences.cn: 大规模的研究应该是协作的.
大多数维基网站属于协同工作网站。

sentences.en: Research and Realization of Key Technologies in Product Collaborative Design.
sentences.cn: 产品协同设计过程中关键技术的研究与实现.

sentences.en: Service choreography on the other hand is more collaborative in nature.
sentences.cn: 另一方面,服务编排具有更多的协作性质.

sentences.en: System structure of virtual product design in collaborative environment is put forward.
sentences.cn: 提出了协同环境下虚拟产品设计系统的体系结构.

sentences.en: The concept of collaborative MES ( manufacturing execution system ) is put forward.
sentences.cn: 提出了协同MES ( 制造执行系统 ) 的概念.

sentences.en: The Lustre collaborative cache is globally coherent.
sentences.cn: Lustre合作缓存是全局一致的.

sentences.en: The traditional algorithms of collaborative recommendation can't solve the problem very well.
sentences.cn: 传统协作推荐算法都无法很好地解决数据稀疏性问题.

sentences.en: Will the individuals work their best in collaborative environment?
sentences.cn: 将个人的工作,最好在协同环境?

words.tran_cn: [劳经] 合作者；勾结者；通敌者

trans.tran_en: A collaborative piece of work is done by two or more people or groups working together
